entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
